Reviews.Title: S-I-M-P-L-E
Reviews.Author: E. Josephs "omicron"
Reviews.Content: Bought this one for my 12yo niece. I try every piece of electronic equipment before I give it. I was surprised. It took me only 2-3 minutes to get familiar with the camera's operation out of the box (no instruction reading). I found it's set-up to be very intuitive without the massive confusing menu system of - oh - lets say the CANNON POWERSHOT A560.Set up the camera mode on a dial switch.turn flash on/off/auto at a single button.point-click-picture. And nice ones too.small problem - the picture stabilization mode only seems to work when the flash is used. When the flash is on, you can violently shake this camera all over the place and it will capture the crispest image when it goes off, even your shoes or ceiling if you're shaking it that violently.Using a 4GB sandisk sdhc card, on maximum 10mp, the camera says it will hold just under 2000 pictures on the counter. On minimum 1.2mp setting, the counter stops at 9999. Yes, nine thousand nine hundred ninety nine. The numbers don't add up to me for MP size and # of photos, but if upscaling is used ( as I've read from others) , then these picture quantities do start to make sense.Between the Cannon power shot and another hard to use upscale Sony camera, both my mother and sister  wanted this one for ease of use. What they actually want.My neice looooooooooooves this camera.Takes about 45min of video too.If you want wall sized pictures - this is not for you.Full page picture - It can handle pretty well.4x6 memories - I don't think anyone can go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sally Pace
Reviews.Content: Works well, although a bit slow to recover after a pictures. Easy to transfer to computer. I recommend it for fun photography, for children, teens, elders.

Reviews.Title: Nice and easy to use, great deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Gem Ducky
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace one that I fell in the water with.  I take pictures of everything, my dog, my kids, nature, buildings and anything that catches my eye.  I'm not a photographer, but this camera is easy to use and it's settings enable me to take some awesome pictures.  The more familiar I get with it, the better my pictures are turning out.  This is a great little camera for point and shoot and is extremely easy to use.  The only thing I wish it had (unless it has it and I haven't found it yet) is color filters for sunset photos.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy for Valentines day!!!!! Well worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Jessica L. Voyles
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a last minute impulse buy for my boyfriend for Valentines day. I ordered it on Friday evening and paid the extra for next day shipping. It got to my house about 5pm the next day. I was so excited.I read EVERY review of this camera on here. I was a little worried about the battery life so I bought a ton of batteries just in case. The picture quality is amazing, The features are very fun and very simple to use. The batteries that came with it only lasted about 2 hours. I put fresh Energizer brand batteries in and I was very surprised at how long they lasted. We took several videos at least 3 minutes long or longer and about 60 pictures and they still had about a 1/4 of a charge left. The only thing I agree with everyone on is the lack of an external speaker for the videos is a bummer.My boyfriend who worked in photography for many years loves it. He plays with it all the time just for fun.The only tip I have is don't use the cord that comes with the camera to download the pictures. Simply remove the card and download directly off the card to your computer. It will save on your batteries and it cuts the download time in half or more. Im not overly excited about the Kodak software, as I have used it I am getting better at it but I still don't think it is very user friendly.I would recommend this camera to anyone just wanting to document some fun times and memories with friends. It is a GREAT point and click.

Reviews.Title: A few small words of caution
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: The C180 is a terrific camera, especially at the current sale price.BUTBe prepared to go to [...] and print the 64 page user manual.  What comes with the camera is less than worthless.When you install the EasyShare software, do not choose the standard installation.  There is nothing difficult about the custom/advanced option and it will allow you to opt out of installing some greeting card software they have added in.  You will also have the chance to say you are interested only in software updates and not Kodak advertisements.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Digital Camera C180 10MP 3x Optical Zoom
Reviews.Author: Rahul Dev "RD"
Reviews.Content: It is nice portablel camera. Provides clear picture from close. May not be suitable for long range shots.

Reviews.Title: perfect entry level camera
Reviews.Author: Lizzy L. "Okasan"
Reviews.Content: My 7-year old daughter was given this camera for Christmas. She does not always handle it carefully. She is not a skilled photographer, however when she took this camera to Japan last summer her photos turned out beautifully! We are pleased with the durability of the camera, the ease of use it offers and the price. Only downside--AA batteries needed, but with rechargeables, not really a problem.

Reviews.Title: An excellent buy
Reviews.Author: D. Zhang
Reviews.Content: It is so easy to use and takes high quality pictures, worth the money. I like the video audio clip functions , too.

Reviews.Title: New and improved
Reviews.Author: hardtoplease
Reviews.Content: My needs for a camera are pretty basic: I wanted a slim, portable camera, easy to use and at a good price.  I replaced my older EasyShare camera with this newer model. It is slimmer, gives sharper pictures, better close-ups and focuses more quickly, so you're not waiting 2-3 seconds for the camera to snap the picture.  Downside:  No view finder, such that you always have to use "live view" which runs down the AA batteries. Overall, a very good camera for the money which I also use in my work.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: William J. Christensen
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera for those of us who are not serious photographers.  It is fairly simple to use and has features I have yet discovered, I think.The only negative aspect is the quality of instructions that come with the camera---very minimal but I was able to figure out most techniques through trial and error and having had a "lesser" version" of this camera (which I broke).  Batteries are always a challenge.  I strongly advise using Utlimate Energizer batteries (lithium) which have a long life although expensive (2-3 bucks). I tried using rechargeable batteries but they were so undependable I gave up and went to the Energizers.  Just carry an extra set of batteries with you when you are out picture taking.

Reviews.Title: wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: B. Green
Reviews.Content: My husband wanted a very inexpensive camera to take pictures of our property and machines and things.  He never uses a camera and asked for one for this reason.  He didn't want me to spend very much money on it, either.  He wanted one that could fit in the pocket of his jacket.  I did a review first on Consumers Reports and saw that this camera was rated very good. I usually can find a wonderful price with ease of ordering on Amazon.com, I found it, ordered it, and he loved it.  I must tell you he thought this camera did a great job of doing everything he wanted.  Close up pictures were wonderful.  Color perfect.  Ease of use was a wonderful feature and each and every photo came out beautifully.  Batteries lasted a long, long time.  Now, I use it for all kinds of photo taking and love it!  My friends who are camera literate have mentioned that this camera is a very good camera.  I agree.  You won't be sorry if you are looking for a camera that takes pictures with the ease of size and functions.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Review
Reviews.Author: Ralph A. Montoya
Reviews.Content: This camera is great, it takes very good pictures but in the other hand the battery does not last long.  I love my camera and for the price it is a good deal.

Reviews.Title: One of the best choices, considering the price
Reviews.Author: Marcela C. Oliva
Reviews.Content: It's a very good camera for the price you are paying. Ideal for parties and a great gift for people who just want to point and shoot and forget about everything else.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, but no speaker
Reviews.Author: Book Reader
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a broken camera.  I didn't want to spend a fortune.  I like the size and the picture quality is great.  I wish Kodak had not changed the on/off switch - now a small button instead of part of the dial that chooses which type of picture.By far, the biggest drawback is that there is no speaker!  So, when you make a video, you have to download it, before being able to hear the audio.  I had no idea this was the case and my children are very disappointed by the lack of speaker.

Reviews.Title: It's a great camera for easy use!
Reviews.Author: J. Bennett
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with this camera. It was easy to take pictures and figure out the key features.

Reviews.Title: Geart camera
Reviews.Author: Laura F. Springer
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with my new Kodak camera. It's small enough to carry in my purse & I like how the lens close.I do wish It had more info on how to use it. I am satisfied with the shipping & the time it took. It is a Amazon verified purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Junkie "Dude"
Reviews.Content: No disappointments if you use Kodak software.  we share all photos easily online.  Nothing fancy and easy to use!

Reviews.Title: out of date
Reviews.Author: Annette M. Miller
Reviews.Content: This camera does not have a rechargable battery and I found myself changing batteries quite often.  It is also more bulky than my last camera.  I ended giving it to my daughter and buying another one.  It was inexpensive probably because of these two reasons.

Reviews.Title: BE WARNED! IT BREAKS
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these c180 cameras from amazon (one used, one refurbished) so that i could shoot some 3D videos and photos. within a week or two, both had stopped working. i tried changing batteries, taking out sd card, pluggin in to computer, etc. so, that is why it is rated for 1 star right there. but, another complaint, when it did work, and youre like shooting a video/photo where there is bright light, there will be like a purple line by the light! its very hard to explain, and i dont know if this was a problem with the screen that displayed the photo/video, or if the camera just does that. all in all, DONT BUY THIS CAM UNLESS YOU WANT TO RETURN IT WITHIN 2 WEEKS!!!

Reviews.Title: This product is junk
Reviews.Author: Curt D
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these camera's for my daughters for Christmas.  The power switch on the first one died Christmas morning so I returned it and bought a different camera but kept the second one.  BIG MISTAKE!  Within two months the power switch on the second one died.  Merry Christmas girls!

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: gammin
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 16 yr old daughter. From day one we had nothing but problems. It will not format any memory card we have tired.  Contact Kodak and tried all their solutions. Doing that took longer than expected and we missed the return date one it. Now I have a paper weight.  I wouldn't buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great value, great camers
Reviews.Author: rjrvt
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT value -- 12 Megapixel resolution plus video for under $80.  Easy to set up and use, links directly to my Kodak printer.  Video is also very good, especially for the cost and size.  Big LCD scree is a pleasure to view.

Reviews.Title: No Disappointment Here
Reviews.Author: Lisa M. Cheney "walkingdog"
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before purchasing so I can't add anything original here.  I agree that this is a very easy to use camera. I also purchased the recommended 4GB sandisk to go with it and it added an enormous amount of space. My five year old daughter loves to take pictures with it and she actually includes our heads in her shots. Highly recommend this camera to anyone looking for something easy to use.

Reviews.Title: exactly what I hoped for
Reviews.Author: liss
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my husband for Christmas at a really great price.  He is happy with it as it is very easy to use and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: camera C180 10MP
Reviews.Author: Judy A. Goins "grandma"
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my granddaughter who is 7 yrsShe was using it with ease immediately!She could quickly take a photo , viewed it, delete if needed, andher mom helped her within 10 min program whatever was needed before she started using it!  We are all very very pleased!!!!

Reviews.Title: Incredible!
Reviews.Author: K.W
Reviews.Content: This is a bargain in that for the price you'll get great photo quality. By comparison, the picture quality of this camera is either better than some cameras that are worth over $200 or equal. I'd definitely recommend this camera to just about anyone!

Reviews.Title: starter camera
Reviews.Author: Tracy Bolduc
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 14yr old and also because I have a Kodak printer dock. It is a great starter camera.

Reviews.Title: Worst camera ever
Reviews.Author: S. Gursel
Reviews.Content: I use this camera at work, seldom fortunately. It takes horrible pictures outdoors. All the photos are washed out and the contrast is completely incorrect. Indoors, the camera does not focus properly.Yes, easy to use, but I have had better digital cameras in 90s.

Reviews.Title: fast delivery, great product
Reviews.Author: Jeda C
Reviews.Content: I have no experience using digital cameras, but had no problem with it.  Great images.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C180 10 MP HD Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Christmasangel
Reviews.Content: Gave this camera as a Christmas gift to my then 10 year-old granddaughter.  She was thrilled.  The camera is compact, easy to use and takes good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Best Digital Camera Ever
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Goodman
Reviews.Content: Back in December 2010, I bought the Kodak Easyshare C180 Digital Camera from Walgreens for $59.00 (It was a Christmas Sale). This camera takes good pictures and records good videos. The Kodak Easyshare C180 Digital Camera have the optical zoom and you can record videos up to 21 minutes. The Kodak AA batteries that came with the camera only lasted 5 or 10 minutes. The best batteries to used for the camera is Energizer Ulitmate AA batteries. They last 9 times longer. You got to really stock up on the Energizer Ultimate AA batteries.The first digital camera I had was a Polaroid a530 Digital Camera back in 2009. In 2010, the Polaroid Digital Camera had fell and dropped to the floor so hard (ceramic tile) that it had cracked the screen and broke. The Polaroid Digital Camera didn't have the optical zoom; only the digital zoom. Sometimes the pictures would come out blurred or very dark. And you can only record videos up to 1 minutes. The Kodak Easyshare C180 Digital Camera is better than the Polaroid a530 Digital Camera. I highly recommend the Kodak Easyshare C180 Digital Camera is the best one to buy.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Butterchunks
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera used. It works alright. A bit dated, but it goes through batteries waaaaay too fast. It takes 2 AA's, and I've been using rechargeables designed for high-drain electronics, as well as standard disposable batteries. Strangely, the disposables seem to hold a more consistent charge, but neither one allows me to grab the camera on short notice for quick photos. Most times, I find it is already dead, and its a hassle not being able to keep the batteries in it.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C180 10.2 MP HD Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Linda M Jefferson
Reviews.Content: I would not reccomend this camera because there was no CD software included and product suggested that you were able to download the necessary software directly from Kodak needed to download pictures. The software was never available at Kodak.com as listed just an apology for any inconvenience this may have caused. I liked the camera, but found it useless since there is no way to download the pictures from the internal memory or MMC/SD cards. I would not reccomend purchasing any Kodak cameras since the other Kodak LS443 camera I purchased before and (not from Amazon) had an internal memory problem that required a need to download sofware to fix the error from the Kodak website..it too was not available which left us with an over $500.00 camera useless. My suggestion would be stay clear of Kodak cameras. What used to be a excellent reputation for a camera has proven to leave a bitter taste from two burned purchases. No reflection of Amazon.com

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Roberto Chavarria
Reviews.Content: Excelent product, I recommend it to all who wants to but it. You won't regret it. I garantee that to yo

Reviews.Title: Dull Pictures and No Sound...RETURNING ITEM!!!
Reviews.Author: LadyKay
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product because I had a Kodak camera before and it was a Great camera with GREAT pics and acceptable video quality.  I was expecting the same results if not better, but was sadly disappointed.  I am returning this product because the pictures were dull and the sound did not work.  I was sure to turn the sound on, but still no success when recording a video.  When I attempted to upload the images to my computer I had to cancel because it took a long time for the images and video to upload.  However, I was able to get 1 image to upload to see the quality and it was a little brighter then it looked on the camera, but still not clear enough.  Since I needed a camera, I used my mother's camera and the images uploaded twice as fast....within 3-5 minutes (on the same computer).  The quality of her camera was truly HD.  She has a JVC but I can't afford it at this time so I purchased a Cannon that was referred by some photographers.  I am hoping for better success with my next camera purchase.  This camera cost too much for the poor quality.  Normally I don't write reviews, but I decided to do so because I wanted to give someone the information that they need to make a good purchase....especially online.

Reviews.Title: buenisimo
Reviews.Author: YEIMY
Reviews.Content: lo recomiendo 100%, practico, comodo, excelente producto, muy buen calidad, mejor imposible, , excelente responsabilidad en el tiempo de entrega

Reviews.Title: Lost and Found
Reviews.Author: FISH
Reviews.Content: This camera was our choice for the simplicity and the weight of it. Then we lost it. A very observant lady at the theater was able to find it and returned it safely for us.

Reviews.Title: Camera for utility use
Reviews.Author: bucky101939
Reviews.Content: The camera was my gift to a real estate agent to use for photos of houses for sale.  Still working year later and for a modest price

Reviews.Title: Great for the price, when it works
Reviews.Author: B. Pell
Reviews.Content: First, I purchased this camera for $50 at Big Lots.  For the price, it's an excellent camera.  In ample light, it takes good pictures.  It's easy to use and takes pictures fairly quickly.  I also like that it takes AA because it's easy to use rechargeable batteries I already have.The downside, it randomly stops working and won't power on.  I believe I've narrowed it down to something with the battery door because re-seating the batteries and opening and closing the door multiple times will eventually fix it (unless that's just a fluke).  If it just worked, I'd have given it 5 stars for the price.  I really can only give it 3 at this point.

Reviews.Title: KISS
Reviews.Author: Floyd Hendry "avid reader"
Reviews.Content: A Christmas gift for my 10 year old niece. She's been able to master the controls, enjoys using it & it produces decent images. Can't ask for much more.

Reviews.Title: Pops
Reviews.Author: SheeptheDeep
Reviews.Content: Got this for my pops and he loves it.  The price is right, and the ease of use is great for the middle of the road savvy user.  If you are lookin, do it!

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Gerald
Reviews.Content: This is a very limited camera, but since it is too cheap I am completely sure it is a great deal! It works well... nothing special... but... come on! What do you expect form a $30-camera?

Reviews.Title: Battery Life is Horrible!
Reviews.Author: liny71
Reviews.Content: LOVE the camera, however, the battery life is horrible. Bought one for my mother for Christmas and one for my boyfriend. When I got them the flash didn't work on my boyfriends, but Mom's was fine. Returned it, but was told there were no more in stock to swap it out. Waited a few weeks and they were back in stock - ordered another one. This time the flash works, but after using the camera for less than an hour the batteries were dead! I don't know if something in that camera drains the batteries fast but I have seen other reviewers complaining about the same thing. I'm going to invest in batteries that you can charge in hopes that that will be a good solution.

Reviews.Title: Great little point & shoot!
Reviews.Author: MLfan07
Reviews.Content: I got this camera at a great price during the holidays, and finally had a chance to give it a real road test when I spent the day at a State Park.  The sun was so bright with no shade that I couldn't see a thing out of the preview screen (yes this was annoying but I've noticed that even a lot of more expensive digitals don't have separate view screens these days), and the wind was fairly strong so I know that many times I wasn't able to hold the camera very steady.  So basically I was taking photos blind and shaky especially toward the end when I stopped even trying --  yet out of fifty shots I took only *one* was in need of deleting (it was an indoor shot where I manually turned the flash off and didn't have a steady enough grip to prevent blurring the first time, I retook and 2nd one came out fine).  I was very impressed, great shots for little effort.  Even without using the setting for reducing blur from camera shake they were all crisp and clear.  It did go through batteries fast at first, but having read the reviews here I bought the lithium and they are still going strong after the whole day.  I recommend setting the camera for auto shut off at three minutes, and using a card reader not the camera to transfer photos to your PC; you can also set the screen brightness to power save, all these things will help extend battery life.  I specifically made sure I bought a camera that took regular batteries, so I could take pictures anywhere, any time, and not be stuck on a trip with the inconvenience of needing recharge time.  For a point and shoot, this is an excellent camera at an excellent price.  If you want to take "photographs" instead of snapshots, you'll probably want to get a DSLR.

Reviews.Title: this camera is very great
Reviews.Author: stephanie
Reviews.Content: i got this camera  and their isnt no  thing i could say that is bad with this...in my eye it take great pictures, it works all the time unlike my other camera i have brought on here, it is just a wonderful camera do but[...]

Reviews.Title: Christmas present
Reviews.Author: Hiker
Reviews.Content: It was a Christmas gift for my mother. She is a little technilogically challenged. She loves and uses this camera with ease.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Sam W
Reviews.Content: Let's face it - the world of digital cameras is so dizzying and complex these days that you are most people are never sure of what, exactly, they are getting.  What I wanted was a small, easy-to-use, non-comlex point and shoot that my son 9-year old son could use so he would stop using my camera.  The C180 delivers on that and more.Physically, it's perfect to slip in an adult's pocket or for a kid's hands.  Nothing fancy; quite boxish-looking at that.  Good screen and no optical view finder, but again, we are looking for simple.  Buttons are easy to use and well arranged.  All-in-all, a good sturdy feel to this camera.But what really sets the C180 apart is that it takes great pictures.  I caught a shot of my son in mid-air on his skateboard and it's perfect.  I was surprised that a low-end camera would capture such a shot, and the colors are really vivid.  I would probably recommend rechargeable batteries, though.The bottom line is that my son was taking shots within a minute of getting it out of the box, and the pictures are really quite good.  For me, now when I do things where I might be worried about camera safety, the C180 gets the call instead of my camera.  Cheap, easy to use, great shots, and I'm not going to be too upset if it gets broken.  Really can't get much better than that!

Reviews.Title: really nice small camera
Reviews.Author: 1flor1 "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera ; my previous camera was only 6 mp,so this larger format is ideal for me.I sell on various sites and needed a camera that could capture jewelry for instance--something my previous camera was not so good at.If you want a compact ,portable,easy to use point and shoot,this camera is what you should consider(also the price was really good).Kodak C180 10 MP HD Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.4 LCD Screen (Silver)

Reviews.Title: point, shoot, take pic, move on with life.
Reviews.Author: Nephilim
Reviews.Content: I got a few of these during the Christmas season. At the time I paid about $55 per. They were going to some not so technically inclined people so I wanted something easy to use and somewhat cheap. This delivered and the image quality was actually better than I thought it would be. If your just looking for something to lug around and snap up a bunch of photos then this should perform just fine.Cons for me were AA batteries (heavy) and no included SD card.Other than that I got what I paid for and I don't regret the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Easiest pint and shoot ever
Reviews.Author: Patrick UM
Reviews.Content: I bought it because my 60 yo mom was looking for an easy operating camera, it was in her hands for a minute before she knew how to operate it, ive had lumix and canons before but this kodak camera seems to be the familys favorite, even my 4 yo nephew was shooting great pics in the snow with it. recommend it 100%

Reviews.Title: Impressive value; Inadequate LCD screen
Reviews.Author: Yudong Hao
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for $50 as a backup camera. I did not really expect much. But this little thing impressed me with its functionalities and image quality. Battery life is also very good. My only gripe is its LCD screen. The size is OK, but its resolution is too low. Previewed pictures look too grainy to enjoy. Nonetheless, it is a very good value for the buck.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Mr Fishing
Reviews.Content: Have only used it for about 10 days, but its simple to use and takes colorful  and sharply focused pics.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: metalmom
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 17 year old daughter and she loves it. She said it had great features and a great zoom.

Reviews.Title: Good.. Maybe
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: The camrea is good but when i plug the usb cord into the camera part the camrea shuts down...I don't know yet if there is a problem with the port on the camrea or the cord...

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Camera girl
Reviews.Content: Bought this so my husband could take it to work as a painter and take before and after pictures and it works great for that.

Reviews.Title: Best camera I've had so far
Reviews.Author: prazcre8or
Reviews.Content: I've had at least 4 different digital cameras since they came out over 10 years ago.  By far, this camera is the easiest and has the clearest pictures of any of them.  It is extremely easy to use, particularly if you have experience with digital cameras and their functions.  I haven't used all of the functions and features yet, but for simple point and shoot, it's an excellent choice, especially with the low price ($50).

Reviews.Title: Kodak C180 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: James T. Bainbridge
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace the Kodak C142 that went bad 3 days after I bought it.  The C180 is OK, if you have bright sunshine.  The flash is too weak for any shot over 10 feet.  The "Memory Card" is a big plus - over 7,000 shots (my printer allows only 4 x 6 inchs).  Carry spare batteries. The C180 allows AA in Lithium, Ni-MH, ZR6 or LR6 (you cannot interchange, but the choices will allow you to find replacements almost anywhere).  My advice, buy a better camera.

Reviews.Title: great for price!
Reviews.Author: J. Eng "shopper"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a gift for my parents whom needed a camera and wanted Kodak.  They also love the big screen and easy to read/work buttons.  This one was perfect for them.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: gthumbva
Reviews.Content: it didn't last 30 minutes before it froze...it wouldn't even turn off and retract the lens.  Even with fresh batteries and hooking it up to the pc to get the few pics it took off, it refused!  Returned.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: David H. Loescher
Reviews.Content: Purchased the camera for my granddaughters for Christmas and they loved it.  I do not think they have put it down yet.

Reviews.Title: EasyShare is Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Reader 4 Him "KDC"
Reviews.Content: I found this camera easy to use and uploads a snap. Highly recommend it for the picture taking challenged much like me that just wants to point and shoot. This is the camera for you. The advanced features are easy to figure out as well. Uploading to youtube is a snap if you prefer to go that route. Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Graet Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: BobTy
Reviews.Content: I was skepticle I first, but I read the reviews and they were mostly good. When I go the camera, I was impressed with the photo quailty and ease of use. I think this is an excellent camera for any photo novice. It's light and portable. The photo quality is in fact better than the video camera I paid over $200.00 for. I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy Peazy!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying I'm a mom. A mom who knows nothing about MPs, shutter speeds and all of that other mumbo jumbo.I wanted a camera that I could take out of the box and use with ease. A simple camera that would take nice, clear pictures of my kids and family.This is it.The pictures are good, no red eyes, no blurriness, no haziness to be found. The pictures aren't the most crisp out there, but I couldn't care less about that. Images are nice and clear, pictures are a snap to take and to me, that's all that matters.Excellent product, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great for price, battery drainer... but at that price hhhmmmm
Reviews.Author: innovator1
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these cameras on Black Friday. I must say i read all the reviews and was somewhat a bit cautious about the purchase, but at the price ($49.95) i said what the heck. For the few days i am using it, i find the picture quality and ease of use very good. I downloaded the latest easyshare software from the Kodak website, so i could upload short films to Youtube and i must say uploading was a breeze. My only beef was it eats batteries, but for fifty dollars i don't think i would have gotten a rechargeable camera for that price. I have lots of rechargeable batteries already, so this shouldn't be a problem. I would recommend this camera for someone who just needs to take pictures, a first camera for a teenager or so. If you want more features in a camera, you should be prepared to spend more.

Reviews.Title: It goes with the price tag
Reviews.Author: roberto monterrosa s
Reviews.Content: This is my first review on Amazon.com Yeah! I'm happy because I read reviews ALL the time. Actualy I read the reviews BEFORE buying this camera and I was under a different impression.Basically I've just got off the phone with a Kodak representative because last night I was using my camera in a low light environment and I realized how "cheap" everything looked. The flash barely helped since it was a big room and my pictures from 6 feet of distance were poor and dark. I would have to be VERY close for the flash to actualy do it's job. Also a feature that most cameras nowadays have is the one where you softly press the shutter button and I will give you a red light to point BEFORE the flash. I thought this camera had but it doesn't. If you are in low light setting (let's say... birthday party) you're on your own and you would have to guess what are you shooting. Quite a bummer to be honest.Overall the pictures outside are good, but indoors and low light are not. Now I know (from Kodak website) that I have to adjust the iso thingy. But still the fact that it will be dark until the flash comes on downgrades the camera BIG time for me.I would think twice now before buying a camera online before seeing it first on a store.Overall I paid under $100 for it, I wasn't expecting much. And so should you.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the money
Reviews.Author: Gary in North Carolina
Reviews.Content: This camera lives up to the name "Kodak".  It so easy to work and takes great pictures and it is so compact.  The only drawback is that it uses up the batteries rather fast (keep extra with you).  But overall a great camera.

Reviews.Title: don't touch it
Reviews.Author: Kangtsui
Reviews.Content: Purchased it for my 5-year-old daughter because of the price. It takes only 2-3 days to drain up two brand new AA batteries, even without any pictures taken. Tested for three times and obtained the same observation. Returned. Will never try this brand any more.Stay away from it.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Schwenk
Reviews.Content: I purchased about five of these camera's to be used at work.My employees tend to beat things up so spending alot was not in the budget especially when they may not last that long.  This camera certainly does the trick.  It's easy to use, the picture quality is great  and an affordable price make it a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Small Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: My wife loves to have up to date pictures of the family, especially our grandsons.  She carries this camera in her pocketbook ready to take pictures at every opportunity.  She likes its simplicity to operate,its small size and the quality of the pictures taken.  She also likes the practicality of taking lots of pictures and being able to delete whatever does not meet her standards.  This mode of operation was not practical with her film box cameras.

Reviews.Title: Excelente Camara
Reviews.Author: Victor Manuel
Reviews.Content: de 4 camaras que he comprado todas han salido excelente, sin ningun tipo de problemas, buena resolucion y calidad de imagenes y video.

ProductInfo.Features:
Amazing quality prints with 10.2 megapixels
3x optical zoom lens
True HD quality: capture stunning pictures
Takes great pictures, makes them even better
The simple way to share
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak C180 10 MP HD Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.4 LCD Screen (Silver)
